msg: * configure.in: Arrange for SVN_CLIENT_EDITOR to be undefined if

author: philip
msg: Change checkout/update so that all directory properties are written
using a log file.  Now close_directory uses a single log file both
to write the properties (regular, entry and wc) and to modify the
revision so that these happen as an atomic operation.  This addresses
Note that close_directory is now more often responsible for changing
the revision, the entries file is written a little less often, slightly
(maybe_bump_dir_info): Only set the revision if the values differ.
(change_dir_prop): Store all properties rather than write them.
(close_directory): Write all properties here, via a log file, rather
than in change_dir_prop.  Set the revision if there are any property
directory to have a null uuid.

author: kfogel
msg: (main): Error if the log message detectably contains a zero byte.
